API Reference¶

class Character¶
#include <Character.h>

Abstract base class for all characters in the game.

Defines common attributes like name, HP, and attack power, as well as common behaviors like taking damage.

Subclassed by Hero, Monster

Public Functions

Character(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower)¶

Constructor for Character.

パラメータ:

  • name -- The name of the character.

  • hp -- The initial (and maximum) hit points.

  • attackPower -- The base attack power.

virtual ~Character() = default¶

Virtual destructor.

virtual void attack(Character &target) = 0¶

Pure virtual function for attacking a target.

パラメータ:

target -- The character to attack.

virtual void takeDamage(int damage)¶

Inflicts damage on the character.

Reduces HP by the specified amount. HP will not drop below 0.

パラメータ:

damage -- The amount of damage to take.

bool isDead() const¶

Checks if the character is dead.

戻り値:

true if HP is 0 or less, false otherwise.

std::string getName() const¶

Gets the character's name.

戻り値:

The name of the character.

int getHp() const¶

Gets the current HP.

戻り値:

The current hit points.

int getMaxHp() const¶

Gets the maximum HP.

戻り値:

The maximum hit points.

int getAttackPower() const¶

Gets the attack power.

戻り値:

The attack power.

Protected Attributes

std::string name¶

The name of the character.

int hp¶

Current hit points.

int maxHp¶

Maximum hit points.

int attackPower¶

Base attack power.

class Dice¶
#include <Dice.h>

Utility class for random number generation.

Uses the Mersenne Twister engine for high-quality random numbers.

Public Static Functions

static void init()¶

Initializes the random number generator.

Should be called once at the beginning of the program.

static int get(int min, int max)¶

Generates a random integer within a specified range.

パラメータ:

  • min -- The minimum value (inclusive).

  • max -- The maximum value (inclusive).

戻り値:

A random integer between min and max.

Private Static Attributes

static std::mt19937 mt¶

Mersenne Twister random number generator.

class GameManager¶
#include <GameManager.h>

Manages the game flow and battle logic.

This class handles the initialization of the game, the battle loop, and the interaction between the Hero and the Monster.

Public Functions

GameManager()¶

Constructor for GameManager.

Initializes the random number generator.

void start()¶

Starts the game.

Sets up the characters and begins the battle loop.

Private Functions

void battle()¶

Executes the main battle loop.

Continues until either the Hero or the Monster is defeated.

void heroTurn()¶

Executes the Hero's turn.

Handles player input for attacking or using skills.

void monsterTurn()¶

Executes the Monster's turn.

Handles the monster's AI logic.

void showStatus()¶

Displays the current status of the characters.

Private Members

std::unique_ptr<Hero> hero¶

Pointer to the player's Hero.

std::unique_ptr<Monster> monster¶

Pointer to the enemy Monster.

class Hero : public Character¶
#include <Hero.h>

Represents the player's character (Hero).

Inherits from Character and adds mana points (MP) and skill capabilities.

Public Functions

Hero(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower, int mp)¶

Constructor for Hero.

パラメータ:

  • name -- The name of the hero.

  • hp -- The initial HP.

  • attackPower -- The base attack power.

  • mp -- The initial MP.

virtual void attack(Character &target) override¶

Attacks a target character.

Overrides the base attack method to include critical hit logic or other hero-specific mechanics.

パラメータ:

target -- The character to attack.

void useSkill(const Skill &skill, Character &target)¶

Uses a skill on a target.

パラメータ:

  • skill -- The skill to use.

  • target -- The target of the skill.

void heal(int amount)¶

Heals the hero by a specified amount.

パラメータ:

amount -- The amount of HP to recover.

void recoverMp(int amount)¶

Recovers MP by a specified amount.

パラメータ:

amount -- The amount of MP to recover.

bool payMp(int amount)¶

Attempts to pay a specified amount of MP.

パラメータ:

amount -- The amount of MP to spend.

戻り値:

true if MP was sufficient and spent, false otherwise.

int getMp() const¶

Gets the current MP.

戻り値:

The current MP.

int getMaxMp() const¶

Gets the maximum MP.

戻り値:

The maximum MP.

const std::vector<Skill> &getSkills() const¶

Gets the list of skills learned by the hero.

戻り値:

A constant reference to the vector of skills.

void addSkill(const Skill &skill)¶

Adds a skill to the hero's repertoire.

パラメータ:

skill -- The skill to learn.

Private Members

int mp¶

Current Magic Points.

int maxMp¶

Maximum Magic Points.

std::vector<Skill> skills¶

List of learned skills.

class Monster : public Character¶
#include <Monster.h>

Represents an enemy character (Monster).

Inherits from Character and includes AI logic for battle actions.

Public Functions

Monster(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower)¶

Constructor for Monster.

パラメータ:

  • name -- The name of the monster.

  • hp -- The initial HP.

  • attackPower -- The base attack power.

virtual void attack(Character &target) override¶

Attacks a target character.

パラメータ:

target -- The character to attack.

void performAction(Character &target)¶

Performs an action during the monster's turn.

Decides whether to attack or perform other actions based on AI logic.

パラメータ:

target -- The target of the action (usually the Hero).

class Skill¶
#include <Skill.h>

Represents a skill or ability.

A skill has a name, MP cost, power (damage or heal amount), and a type.

Public Functions

Skill(std::string name, int mpCost, int power, SkillType type)¶

Constructor for Skill.

パラメータ:

  • name -- The name of the skill.

  • mpCost -- The MP cost to use the skill.

  • power -- The power of the skill (damage or healing amount).

  • type -- The type of the skill (ATTACK or HEAL).

std::string getName() const¶

Gets the name of the skill.

戻り値:

The skill name.

int getMpCost() const¶

Gets the MP cost of the skill.

戻り値:

The MP cost.

int getPower() const¶

Gets the power of the skill.

戻り値:

The power value.

SkillType getType() const¶

Gets the type of the skill.

戻り値:

The skill type.

Private Members

std::string name¶

The name of the skill.

int mpCost¶

The MP cost required to use the skill.

int power¶

The power of the skill.

SkillType type¶

The type of the skill.

Enums

enum class SkillType¶

Enumeration of skill types.

Values:

enumerator ATTACK¶

Offensive skill that deals damage.

enumerator HEAL¶

Support skill that restores HP.
